Package app.core.domain.model

Class Time

java.lang.Object
app.core.domain.model.Time
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Time>
public class Time extends Object implements Comparable<Time>, Serializable
Represents a time through hours, minutes and seconds.
Author:
Group 40

    • isBigger

      public boolean isBigger(Time otherTime)
      Returns true if the time is greater than the time received by parameter. If the time is less than or equal to the time received by parameter, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      otherTime - the other time against which the time is compared.
      Returns:
      true if the time is greater than the time received by parameter, otherwise returns false.

    • isBiggerOrEquals

      public boolean isBiggerOrEquals(Time otherTime)
      Returns true if the time is greater or equals than the time received by parameter. If the time is less than to the time received by parameter, it returns false.
      Parameters:
      otherTime - the other time against which the time is compared.
      Returns:
      true if the time is greater or equals than the time received by parameter, otherwise returns false.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Time otherTime)
      Compares the time with the other time received by parameter.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Time>
      Parameters:
      otherTime - the time to be compared.
      Returns:
      the value 0 if the otherTime received is equal to the time; the value -1 if the otherTime is later than the time; the value 1 if the otherTime is before time.
